definitions: An activity that one engages in for amusement or fun.
A form of competitive activity or sport played according to rules.
Athletics or sports as a lesson or activity at school.
The equipment for a game, especially a board game or a video game.
A person's performance in a game; a person's standard of play.
A complete episode or period of play, ending in a final result.
A single portion of play forming a scoring unit in a match, especially in tennis.
A score of 100 points for tricks bid and made (the best of three games constituting a rubber).
A type of activity or business regarded as a game.
A secret and clever plan or trick.
Wild mammals or birds hunted for sport or food.
The flesh of wild mammals or birds, used as food.
